publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-3122.1 Sun Microsystems (lodged on 13 January 2009) Gil Paterson*

S3M-3122.1 Alex Neil: Sun Microsystems—As an amendment to motion (S3M-3122) in the name of Mary Mulligan, insert at end "notes that Rolls Royce made 150 people redundant at its East Kilbride plant at the end of last year; also notes that Sir John Rose, Chief Executive of Rolls Royce, sits on Prime Minister Gordon Brown’s International Business Advisory Council, and considers that both Gordon Brown and Andy Kerr, the local Labour MSP, should be embarrassed that at this time of rising unemployment Sir John is adding to the dole queue." Supported by: Bill Kidd, Bashir Ahmad, Kenneth Gibson, Rob Gibson, Christine Grahame, Brian Adam, Michael Matheson, Ian McKee, Stuart McMillan, Gil Paterson, Christina McKelvie*
